definitions.definition: A means of indemnity against a future occurrence of an uncertain event.
definitions.example: The car was totalled, but fortunately I had insurance.
After five years in banking, I switched to insurance.

definitions.definition: Any attempt to forestall an unfavorable event.
definitions.example: The sky was clear, but I took my umbrella for insurance.

definitions.definition: A bet made after the deal, which pays off if the dealer has blackjack.
definitions.example: I only take insurance if the count is right.
